EmailTemplate.name: Mass Email Template Text Only
EmailTemplate.subject: Hello {!Contact.FirstName}. Do you still need cash for your business?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName}, Did you know your credit card machine may get you up to $600,000 in unsecured working capital in as few as 10 days!
Call or email us today, and see how much {!Lead.Company} qualifies for!
SMART
No Personal Guarantees*
No Liens or Collateral
No Fixed Payment Schedule
No Business Use Restrictions
No Application Fees
FAST
Apply in Less Than 3 Minutes
Cash Wired to You in 7-10 Days
EASY
No Complicated Paperwork
Sincerely,
{!Lead.OwnerFullName}
{!Lead.OwnerPhone}
{!Lead.OwnerEmail}
*Individuals only liable in cases of fraud, misrepresentation, and as further detailed in contract.
